stages.intro_zh: 長按電源鍵開/關機。首次使用需透過DJI Mimo App與手機連線啟動裝置。按下拍照/錄影鍵即可快速拍攝。拖動觸控螢幕或使用遙桿調整鏡頭方向。
stages.intro_en: Long press the power button to power on/off. For initial use, connect to your smartphone with the DJI Mimo App to activate. Press the photo/video button to quickly take photos or record videos. Use the touchscreen or joystick to adjust the camera angle.

quiz.question_zh: DJI Pocket 是哪一類型的裝置？
quiz.question_en: What type of device is the DJI Pocket?

stages.intro_zh: 切換至跟隨/鎖定/FPV等三種雲台模式。在專用菜單啟用定格或運動延時攝影。啟用全景功能自動拍攝多張組合大片。在觸控螢幕框選主體，啟動ActiveTrack智能跟隨。
stages.intro_en: Switch gimbal between Follow, Lock, and FPV modes for different moves. Use the menu to enable Timelapse or Motionlapse shooting. Activate panorama to auto-capture multiple images and stitch them. Use touch screen to select a subject and enable ActiveTrack for tracking.

quiz.question_zh: DJI Pocket 支援下列哪種運鏡模式？
quiz.question_en: Which movement mode does DJI Pocket support?

stages.intro_zh: 插上手機連接器、開啟DJI Mimo實時預覽與影像剪輯。安裝無線模組可遠端遙控與WiFi檔案傳輸。將機身連接電腦或透過手機APP備份到雲端。使用專用轉接頭輸出HDMI畫面到大螢幕教學或展示。
stages.intro_en: Attach smartphone connector and use DJI Mimo for real-time preview and editing. Add the wireless module for remote control and WiFi file transfer. Connect the device to a computer or use the app to back up files to the cloud. Use a special adapter to output HDMI video to a large screen for teaching or showcasing.

quiz.question_zh: 要用手機APP即時預覽需用什麼？
quiz.question_en: What do you need for real-time preview on phone app?
